sentences.sentence: Recent public opinion surveys show Obama retaking a slim lead over McCain.
sentences.translation: 最近的民意调查显示奥巴马再次以微弱优势赶超了麦凯恩。

sentences.sentence: Some fear that the tea-party victories may cost the Republicans their chance of retaking the Senate.
sentences.translation: 一些人担心，“茶党”的胜利可能会使共和党失掉重夺参议院的机会。

sentences.sentence: You can take the quiz as many times as you wish, but you must go all the way through before retaking any questions.
sentences.translation: 这个测验你可以作(做)很多次，但在你重新开始测验前必须完成上一次测验的所有内容。
